page.home.hero.title: Hi, I'm Alex!
page.home.skill.description.1: Moving around a lot meant having to constantly adjust to new school systems and languages. During this journey, I had to do consistently extra work to learn new languages, fill knowledge gaps and to adapt to new environments and cultures.
page.home.skill.description.2: Being in so many different places encouraged me to not only learn new languages (English, Italian, German and French and Spanish) but also how to effectively communicate with people from a variety of different backgrounds.
page.home.skill.description.3: Every new place I moved to had vastly different expectations for my previous knowledge and experience. This meant that if I wanted to stay at the top of my classes, I had to bite the bullet and not lose hope despite being behind at the beginning.
page.home.edu.description.1: CODE's concept is all about project-based learning and digital products, allowing students to get credits from created projects. By taking lead positions in several projects, I became a strong programmer and leader/mentor in little time while guiding our process and teaching new concepts and frameworks to myself and other teammates. I had to wear several hats at once and learn about design and product management, despite my study program being Software Engineering. I am currently finishing my second-to-last semester.
page.home.edu.description.2: TU Delft is consistently ranked among the top 50 universities for studying Computer Science and Engineering and despite an over 50% failure rate for first year students, I successfully passed the year that I spent there.
page.home.edu.description.3: At Harriton High School I successfully graduated with two diplomas- namely the America High School diploma and the International Baccalaureate diploma. I also took part in the school's Science Olympiad team where we ranked among the top 3 schools in the U.S.A. for all three years I participated. Building robotic arms and hovercrafts eventually sparked my interest in Computer Science.
component.cookie.message: I use cookies just for fun. Feel free to opt out if you don't want to share data :)
home.projects.foodle.generalDescription: In the beginning of 2022 I co-founded Foodle, which is a platform to easily rent and rent out licensed kitchen spaces in the neighborhood.
home.projects.foodle.fullstack: As the fullstack tech lead of the team I implemented and integrated a lot of the major app features while mentoring 5 other developers. Some examples of these features include a login with advanced security features, an integration with AWS, backend GQL operations and several frontend features including a carousel and a complex drag-and-drop image uploader.
home.projects.foodle.design: I worked on several designs for our landing page, made several promotional brochures and Instagram posts and created and edited several pitch decks for our project.
home.projects.foodle.product: I pitched our project to large audiences of investors and restaurants (120+) as well as many potential renters. I worked on our own messaging and ran several online ads.
home.projects.hashtune.generalDescriptio: Hashtune is  a musical NFT platform with the goal of democratizing the music industry and giving proper credit to artists.
home.projects.hashtune.frontend: At Hashtune I took the lead in Frontend Engineering and implemented several key features, like the home, artist, and artwork pages.
home.projects.tradeRoute.generalDescript: Trade Route is a platform for food companies to plan and organize their finances and promotions across all the different retailers they work with.
home.projects.tradeRoute.frontend: I translated most of an application that was originally made on Excel to actual Java and JavaFX code.
home.projects.tradeRoute.design: Due to the original application being on Excel, I needed to rework the design for a JavaFX application.
home.projects.subheader: So far most of my software engineering work has been in Startup Projects.
home.skills.header: This gave me very valuable skills for coding.
home.education.header: My education also shaped me as a programmer.
